title: Relic Interaction With Zz'rots Needs Changed
body:
Hey Riot i was just wondering if you can fix something.  i know it is not a bug due to the small Zzs being coded as a minion i would assume, but you should somehow change the code to where relic shield procs do not go off on them.  Wasted several relic procs trying to clear them from base and since we all know that they dont give gold it was a huge waste.

Thanks.

EDIT: WHY CAN NASUS GET STACKS FROM IT.

replies.body:
Played Zac top against Garen. He rushed Zz'rots because of course he did. I have my minion wave pushed to the mid lane. He ults me just slightly in front of my turret, popping my passive and lays down the portal in the bush. As my passive sloooowly inched toward combining, the minions spawned from the portal come in range of the turret and get zapped, but not before hitting my blobs. Garen is just spamming laugh while minions take me out and there's nothing I can do.

This is the most rekt I have ever felt.

>EDIT: WHY CAN NASUS GET STACKS FROM IT.

Zz'Rot bugs aren't anything special in this respect, actually.
Susan gets stacks from killing *anything*.
Minions, champions, jungle mobs, structures, Bugs, Tentacles, etc.
Lol it just feels accelerated haha

If you want accelerated, play Illaoi against him.
No point in even leveling her E. He just eats it and gets free stacks.

That definitely seems like a pain in the butt. Taking note of that interaction and going to followup with the designer who's working on zzrot for 6.6 (though it may be too late to get something in for that patch).
Thank you my man.  I assumed it would be a somewhat difficult code due to it being coded mostly like a minion with gold value 0.  Hope it's not to much of a pain for the team :D

Honestly, riot needs to  either put a gold amount on these minions or nerf either the minion hp/spawn rate or the gold cost of the item itself. This item is being bought  with very little consequence and its able to do alot on the map. This one item allows smart players to outpressure the enemy alone in two lanes especially against less skilled players.

I believe that maybe 3 - 5 would be reasonable but im not 100% sure on the amount of zzrots that come out.  It would be farmable at that point and could be abused by say nasus?  I do agree however they are a tad op, had  in top lane 3 hit the inhib turret at the same time and did 400ish.  This Splitpush meta is downright boring.
Nasus can already farm the minions. They put a portal top against my friend playing Nasus and it was the worst decision they ever made. #600stacksat24minutes
Good lord i would of thought they'd think about something like that
NOPE literally free stacks.
As a Nasus player. I love when people build Rot against me. I just stand still and farm it. So wonderful
They clear my shrooms as well. It should be atleast 1 or 2 gold for the smaller zz's and 3 for the larger one.
Teemo is so weak right now, I actually commend you for having the balls to play him...
Zz'rot and Scuttle are the reason Teemos can't have nice things apparently.

I agree that is very annoying didn't even think about shrooms.  The thing with the gold is that it could become abused.  They would have to then go through and limit the portal to X minions spawning from it to cut down gold that could be earned from it.  It would probably be somewhat difficult also to code them to not trigger mushrooms because im guessing they are just coded as a minion with a value of 0.
